question: Commando Battalion for Resolute Action (CoBRA), which was making news recently, is a commando force of which CAPF?
explanation:
The Commando Battalion for Resolute Action (CoBRA) was raised under the CRPF for intelligence-based jungle warfare operations. It was launched in the year 2009.
Recently, a maiden contingent of 34 CRPF women personnel was inducted into the CoBRA force, which contained only male personnel till now. The new women team will be deployed in the anti-Naxal operations.
